Skip to main content

Front-end Frameworks

Kickoff

Github Twitter Email MIT

A lightweight front-end framework for creating scalable, responsive sites

Kickoff is an actively maintained front-end framework, created by Zander Martineau and Ashley Nolan. The framework is not meant to be too prescriptive - we don't want to force developers into a certain coding style - and so can be used as a starting point for any type of project.

  • IE: 8
  • Chrome: latest
  • Safari: latest
  • Firefox: latest
  • Opera: latest
  • LESS:
  • Sass: true
  • Mobile: true
  • Tablet: true
  • Desktop: true

Bootstrap

Github Twitter Email MIT

A lightweight front-end framework for creating scalable, responsive sites

Kickoff is an actively maintained front-end framework, created by Zander Martineau and Ashley Nolan. The framework is not meant to be too prescriptive - we don't want to force developers into a certain coding style - and so can be used as a starting point for any type of project.
